text: Thomas Steven Middleditch (born March 10, 1982) is a Canadian actor, comedian and screenwriter. He is known for his role as Richard Hendricks in the HBO series Silicon Valley (2014â€“2019). He voiced Harold Hutchins in Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie (2017), and Terry in the Hulu adult animated sci-fi series Solar Opposites. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from British Columbia Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television writers Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Satellite Award winners Category:Writers from British Columbia Category:Writers from Toronto
